name: Back Stabbers (Generic Brand Name)
description:
Made for the 2020 Ben Bonk Game Jam

*[Sorry for only windows version, I am using Clickteam Fusion 2.5 which needs you to pay extra for features like Linux, HTML5, Mac, and Android exports. By next year I should be able to comfortably use Unity.]*

Travel to "Nowhere Town", and talk to the local residents. Gain their trust by completing quests and find out which one is your arch nemesis, "Slimo Roberovski".

If you have problems near the end, here is a tip.

 DON"T LOOK AWAY FROM SLIMO
